description: Context for FCA or pattern structures that gives description of every object
title: FCA or PS Context

items.description: Context metadata such as object names and common params of descriptions
items.title: Context Metadata

___Params.description: A shared info for descriptions in the context such as attribute names
___Params.title: Description Common Info

___Description.description: Human readable description of the context
___Description.title: Context Description

___ObjNames.description: Names of objects in the context
___ObjNames.title: Names of Objects

items.description: A name of a single object
items.title: Object Name

___Count.description: Total number of all objets in the context
___Count.title: Number of Objects

___Data.description: Object descriptions are given in this array. The name of object is given by THIS[0].ObjNames and by the index of the object in this array
___Data.title: List of Object Descriptions

items.description: A description of a single object. Every description is a pattern.
items.title: Object Description
